SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT23_SAK
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is a positive acknowledgement of an 03 Select Command.
From: GPA To: User
Notes: ------ The Basic Header identifies the SELECT request which is being acknowledged. Field 338: <delivery-subset-list> is only present if output state has been selected. Field tag 502 is mandatory in SWIFTNet Phase 1 and not allowed in SWIFTNet Phase 2.

SystemField.Name: application-id
SystemField.description:
Application Identifier, where:
a) F = FIN application
b) A/L = GPA application
c) X = all applications

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: application-id
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Application Identifier, where:
a) F = FIN application
b) A/L = GPA application
c) X = all applications

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Application Identifier '" + $value + "'. Valid Application Identifier values are : F, A, L, X."

SystemField.Name: session-number
SystemField.description: Session Number allocated to the new FIN session.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: session-number
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Session Number allocated to the new session.

SystemField.Name: date-time
SystemField.description: Date and time, local to the user, on which the SELECT was accepted.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: date-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFTNetwork is in GMT.

SystemField.Name: window-size
SystemField.description: Maximum number of messages sent or received without waiting for or sending acknowledgement.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: window-size
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Maximum number of messages sent or received without waiting for or sending acknowledgement.

SystemField.Name: select-state
SystemField.description:
LT select state, where:
a) YN = input only
b) NY = output only
c) YY = input and output.
Output refers to messages which are not LT-directed.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: select-state
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
LT select state, where:
a) YN = input only
b) NY = output only
c) YY = input and output.
Output refers to messages which are not LT-directed.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid State '" + $value + "'. Valid State values are : YN, NY, YY."

SystemField.Name: lt-directed-queue
SystemField.description:
Select output of messages from the LT-directed queue, where:
a) Y = yes
b) N = no

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: lt-directed-queue
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Select output of messages from the LT-directed queue, where:
a) Y = yes
b) N = no

SystemField.Name: delivery-subset-list
SystemField.description: Up to 30 delivery subsets can be selected.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: delivery-subset-list
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Up to 30 delivery subsets can be selected.

SystemField.Name: previous-session-info
SystemField.description:
Previous session information, including:
a) date last session opened
b) time last session opened
c) session number
d) date last session closed
e) time last session closed
f) reason for closure
g) last ISN received
h) last OSN sent

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: previous-session-info
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Previous session information, including:
a) date last session opened
b) time last session opened
c) session number
d) date last session closed
e) time last session closed
f) reason for closure
g) last ISN received
h) last OSN sent

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Last-Session-Opened-Date '" + $value + "'. last-session-opened-date should be in the format yyMMdd"
"Invalid Last-Session-Opened-Time '" + $value + "'. last-session-opened-time should be in the format HHmm"
"Invalid Last-Session-Closed-Date '" + $value + "'. last-session-closed-date should be in the format yyMMdd"
"Invalid Last-Session-Closed-Time '" + $value + "'. last-session-closed-time should be in the format HHmm"

SystemField.Name: current-session-info
SystemField.description:
Current session information. For example: 00250000450000440000500000501 where:
a) session-number = 025
b) isn = 000045
c) isnnak = 000044
d) osn = 000050
e) osnnak = 000050
f) ack-replay-indicator = 1

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: current-session-info
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Current session information. For example: 00250000450000440000500000501 where:
a) session-number = 025
b) isn = 000045
c) isnnak = 000044
d) osn = 000050
e) osnnak = 000050
f) ack-replay-indicator = 1

fieldvalidation.name: E1
fieldvalidation.comment: Only ONE of the field should be present.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Only one of the fields 'previous-session-info' or 'current-session-info' should be present."

fieldvalidation.name: E2
fieldvalidation.comment: Field 338: delivery-subset-list is only present if output state has been selected.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 338: delivery-subset-list is only present if output state has been selected."
